Text: Anybody get past the cd check on this?
I'm the OP - Please tell me exactly what you mean and I'll see if I can help.
I couldn't get the game to load, kept asking for the cd to be inserted.  I wound up finding an iso of the game elsewhere.  Will continue to seed this copy, maybe the problem was just with my pc.
Ack.  I figured everyone would just burn the files to CD using Imgburn or something similar.  Guess I could have posted the iso.  Anyway, glad you found it, and thanks for seeding :)
